headline.main: Officials Call Microbes Most Urgent Food Threat

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AMERICANS who wonder about the safety of the food they eat are probably worried about the wrong thing, many authorities now say. The most urgent threat, these experts believe, comes not from pesticides and food additives, but from old-fashioned, natural microbes that contaminate poultry, eggs and meat.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: With recent reports of health hazards in common foods, fear of environmental chemicals is becoming more widespread in society.
docs.snippet: LEAD: With recent reports of health hazards in common foods, fear of environmental chemicals is becoming more widespread in society.

headline.main: Study Ties Drugs to Impaired Fetuses

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The largest and most conclusive study of drug use in pregnancy has found that the use of cocaine or marijauna impairs fetal development.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The largest and most conclusive study of drug use in pregnancy has found that the use of cocaine or marijauna impairs fetal development.
